queryParameters.name: StartDate
queryParameters.description: The start date for fetching transactions. Defaults to 7 days ago from the current date.

queryParameters.name: EndDate
queryParameters.description: The end date for fetching transactions. Defaults to the end of the current day.

description: Retrieves details of a specific transaction by providing its ID.

pathParameters.name: transactionId
pathParameters.description: ID of the transaction to retrieve.

description: Cancels a transaction before or after it has been pushed. However, if the blockchain already confirmed the transaction, it is not possible to cancel it.

pathParameters.name: transactionId
pathParameters.description: ID of the transaction to cancel.

fields.name: transactionId
fields.description: ID of the transaction to cancel.

description: Signs and pushes a transaction to the blockchain.

pathParameters.name: transactionId
pathParameters.description: ID of the transaction to sign and push.

fields.name: transactionId
fields.description: ID of the transaction to sign and push.

fields.name: customerTag
fields.description: Tag identifying the transaction by the customer.

fields.name: customerRefId
fields.description: ID identifying the transaction for the customer.

fields.name: operation
fields.description: Operation type for the transaction. Possible values are 'TRANSFER', 'CREATE', 'MINT', 'MELT', 'DELEGATE', 'DESTROY', 'DEPLOYFROMFACTORY'.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the transaction.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Additional metadata for the transaction.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Source information for a new transaction.

fields.name: destination
fields.description: Destination information for a new transaction.

fields.name: priority
fields.description: Priority level of the transaction. Possible values are 'LOW', 'MEDIUM', 'HIGH'.

fields.name: isExactValueTransfer
fields.description: Indicates if the transaction requires an exact value transfer.

fields.name: gasStationWalletId
fields.description: ID of the gas station wallet, if applicable.

description: Estimate the associated costs of a transaction before executing it.

fields.name: customerTag
fields.description: Tag identifying the transaction by the customer.

fields.name: customerRefId
fields.description: ID identifying the transaction for the customer.

fields.name: operation
fields.description: Operation type for the transaction. Possible values are 'TRANSFER', 'CREATE', 'MINT', 'MELT', 'DELEGATE', 'DESTROY', 'DEPLOYFROMFACTORY'.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the transaction.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Additional metadata for the transaction.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Source information for a new transaction.

fields.name: destination
fields.description: Destination information for a new transaction.

fields.name: priority
fields.description: Priority level of the transaction. Possible values are 'LOW', 'MEDIUM', 'HIGH'.

fields.name: isExactValueTransfer
fields.description: Indicates if the transaction requires an exact value transfer.

fields.name: gasStationWalletId
fields.description: ID of the gas station wallet, if applicable.

description: Speed-up a transaction after it has been pushed. However, if the blockchain already confirmed the transaction, it is not possible to speed-up it.

fields.name: transactionId
fields.description: The unique identifier of the transaction to be sped up.

fields.name: increaseFeePercentage
fields.description: The percentage of gas fee increase. Must be between 0 and 100.
